# WEAPON::ADD_PED_AMMO_BY_TYPE

## Summary
Adds the ammo amount based on type. If an item of the type doesn't exist, one will be created

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **AMMO_TYPE** ammoType
* **INT** ammoAmount

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Ammo types: https://gist.github.com/root-cause/faf41f59f7a6d818b7db0b839bd147c1
